info.author: Michael A. G. Aivazis
info.description:
---------------------------------------
pythian: a friendly fork of pythia
---------------------------------------

About Pythian
=============

pythian is a fork of pythia, and is developed as part of pathos: https://github.com/uqfoundation/pathos
info.name: pythian
info.summary: An extensible, object-oriented framework for specifying and staging complex, multi-physics simulations (FORK)
info.html_description: pythian is a fork of pythia, and is developed as part of pathos: https://github.com/uqfoundation/pathos
